<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A value indicating an infinite flow/capacity/weight of a block/edge.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Not using numeric&#95;limits&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;::max(), as the values can be summed up</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// during the execution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a001dbf74fedb2ab9b6f541f6943dea14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a001dbf74fedb2ab9b6f541f6943dea14">INF</a> = ((int64&#95;t)1) &lt;&lt; 50;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The minimum-cost maximum flow algorithm.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The algorithm finds the maximum flow of minimum cost on a given (directed)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">/// network using a modified version of the classical Moore-Bellman-Ford</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">/// approach. The algorithm applies a number of augmentation iterations in which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">/// flow is sent along paths of positive capacity from the source to the sink.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The worst-case time complexity of the implementation is O(v(f)&#42;m&#42;n), where</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">/// where m is the number of edges, n is the number of vertices, and v(f) is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">/// value of the maximum flow. However, the observed running time on typical</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instances is sub-quadratic, that is, o(n^2).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The input is a set of edges with specified costs and capacities, and a pair</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of nodes (source and sink). The output is the flow along each edge of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">/// minimum total cost respecting the given edge capacities.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a246fc8776a1383f88a74fad1a98450fb">MinCostMaxFlow</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a246fc8776a1383f88a74fad1a98450fb"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a246fc8776a1383f88a74fad1a98450fb">MinCostMaxFlow</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params) : Params(Params) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize algorithm&#39;s data structures for a network of a given size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#acbf43214acfd3c95a6e28d1db4989d91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#acbf43214acfd3c95a6e28d1db4989d91">initialize</a>(uint64&#95;t NodeCount, uint64&#95;t SourceNode, uint64&#95;t SinkNode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    Source = SourceNode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    Target = SinkNode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes = std::vector&lt;Node&gt;(NodeCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    Edges = std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge&gt;&gt;(NodeCount, std::vector&lt;Edge&gt;());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Params.EvenFlowDistribution)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      AugmentingEdges =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge &#42;&gt;&gt;(NodeCount, std::vector&lt;Edge &#42;&gt;());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Run the algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a523a13976e6717de53ffbcc67d521617"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a523a13976e6717de53ffbcc67d521617">run</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Starting profi for &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Nodes.size() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; nodes\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iteratively find an augmentation path/dag in the network and send the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flow along its edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AugmentationIters = applyFlowAugmentation();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the total flow and its cost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t TotalCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t TotalFlow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t Src = 0; Src &lt; Nodes.size(); Src++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge.Flow &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">          TotalCost += Edge.Cost &#42; Edge.Flow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Src == Source)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">            TotalFlow += Edge.Flow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Completed profi after &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; AugmentationIters</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; iterations with &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; TotalFlow &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; total flow&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; of &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; TotalCost &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; cost\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Adding an edge to the network with a specified capacity and a cost.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Multiple edges between a pair of nodes are allowed but self-edges</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// are not supported.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(uint64&#95;t Src, uint64&#95;t Dst, int64&#95;t Capacity, int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Capacity &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;adding an edge of zero capacity&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Src != Dst &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;loop edge are not supported&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    Edge SrcEdge;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    SrcEdge.Dst = Dst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    SrcEdge.Cost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    SrcEdge.Capacity = Capacity;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    SrcEdge.Flow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">    SrcEdge.RevEdgeIndex = Edges&#91;Dst&#93;.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    Edge DstEdge;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    DstEdge.Dst = Src;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    DstEdge.Cost = -<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    DstEdge.Capacity = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    DstEdge.Flow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    DstEdge.RevEdgeIndex = Edges&#91;Src&#93;.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    Edges&#91;Src&#93;.push&#95;back(SrcEdge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    Edges&#91;Dst&#93;.push&#95;back(DstEdge);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the total flow from a given source node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns a list of pairs (target node, amount of flow to the target).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#aca1fc02088c9f278b02f219d2d64c82c"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#aca1fc02088c9f278b02f219d2d64c82c">getFlow</a>(uint64&#95;t Src)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a>.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(Edge.Dst, Edge.Flow));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the total flow between a pair of nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#afaa7a29ff74835aa8da3d59e395d95b4"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#afaa7a29ff74835aa8da3d59e395d95b4">getFlow</a>(uint64&#95;t Src, uint64&#95;t Dst)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge.Dst == Dst) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a> += Edge.Flow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
