<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Iteratively find an augmentation path/dag in the network and send the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// flow along its edges. The method returns the number of applied iterations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> applyFlowAugmentation() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AugmentationIters = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (findAugmentingPath()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t PathCapacity = computeAugmentingPathCapacity();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PathCapacity &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Progress = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Params.EvenFlowDistribution) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Identify node/edge candidates for augmentation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">          identifyShortestEdges(PathCapacity);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find an augmenting DAG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AugmentingOrder = findAugmentingDAG();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Apply the DAG augmentation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">          Progress = augmentFlowAlongDAG(AugmentingOrder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">          PathCapacity = computeAugmentingPathCapacity();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Progress) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">          augmentFlowAlongPath(PathCapacity);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">          PathCapacity = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">        AugmentationIters++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AugmentationIters;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the capacity of the cannonical augmenting path. If the path is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// saturated (that is, no flow can be sent along the path), then return 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t computeAugmentingPathCapacity() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t PathCapacity = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Now = Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Now != Source) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Pred = Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentNode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;Pred&#93;&#91;Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentEdgeIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Edge.Capacity &gt;= Edge.Flow &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrect edge flow&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t EdgeCapacity = uint64&#95;t(Edge.Capacity - Edge.Flow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">      PathCapacity = std::min(PathCapacity, EdgeCapacity);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">      Now = Pred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PathCapacity;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check for existence of an augmenting path with a positive capacity.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> findAugmentingPath() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize data structures</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Node : Nodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.Distance = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.ParentNode = uint64&#95;t(-1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.ParentEdgeIndex = uint64&#95;t(-1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::queue&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Source);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.Distance = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">      Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Although the residual network contains edges with negative costs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (in particular, backward edges), it can be shown that there are no</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// negative-weight cycles and the following two invariants are maintained:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (i) Dist&#91;Source, V&#93; &gt;= 0 and (ii) Dist&#91;V, Target&#93; &gt;= 0 for all nodes V,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where Dist is the length of the shortest path between two nodes. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allows to prune the search-space of the path-finding algorithm using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the following early-stop criteria:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -- If we find a path with zero-distance from Source to Target, stop the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    search, as the path is the shortest since Dist&#91;Source, Target&#93; &gt;= 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -- If we have Dist&#91;Source, V&#93; &gt; Dist&#91;Source, Target&#93;, then do not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    process node V, as it is guaranteed &#95;not&#95; to be on a shortest path</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    from Source to Target; it follows from inequalities</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    Dist&#91;Source, Target&#93; &gt;= Dist&#91;Source, V&#93; + Dist&#91;V, Target&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                         &gt;= Dist&#91;Source, V&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Params.EvenFlowDistribution &amp;&amp; Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Distance &gt; Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Process adjacent edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t EdgeIdx = 0; EdgeIdx &lt; Edges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.size(); EdgeIdx++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;&#91;EdgeIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge.Flow &lt; Edge.Capacity) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">          uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge.Dst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">          int64&#95;t NewDistance = Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.Distance + Edge.Cost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Distance &gt; NewDistance) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the distance and the parent node/edge</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Distance = NewDistance;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.ParentNode = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.ParentEdgeIndex = EdgeIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the node to the queue, if it is not there yet</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Taken) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Dst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">              Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Update the current flow along the augmenting path.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> augmentFlowAlongPath(uint64&#95;t PathCapacity) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PathCapacity &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;found an incorrect augmenting path&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Now = Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Now != Source) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Pred = Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentNode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;Pred&#93;&#91;Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentEdgeIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;RevEdge = Edges&#91;Now&#93;&#91;Edge.RevEdgeIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">      Edge.Flow += PathCapacity;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">      RevEdge.Flow -= PathCapacity;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">      Now = Pred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Find an Augmenting DAG order using a modified version of DFS in which we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// can visit a node multiple times. In the DFS search, when scanning each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// edge out of a node, continue search at Edge.Dst endpoint if it has not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// been discovered yet and its NumCalls &lt; MaxDfsCalls. The algorithm</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// runs in O(MaxDfsCalls &#42; |Edges| + |Nodes|) time.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It returns an Augmenting Order (Taken nodes in decreasing Finish time)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that starts with Source and ends with Target.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; findAugmentingDAG() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We use a stack based implemenation of DFS to avoid recursion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Defining DFS data structures:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A pair (NodeIdx, EdgeIdx) at the top of the Stack denotes that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - we are currently visiting Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93; and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - the next edge to scan is Edges&#91;NodeIdx&#93;&#91;EdgeIdx&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, uint64&#95;t&gt; StackItemType;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::stack&lt;StackItemType&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; AugmentingOrder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 0: Initialize Node attributes and Time for DFS run</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Node : Nodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.Discovery = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.Finish = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.NumCalls = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">      Node.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Time = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mark Target as Taken</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Taken attribute will be propagated backwards from Target towards Source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 1: Start DFS traversal from Source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.emplace(Source, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.Discovery = ++Time;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeIdx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EdgeIdx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we haven&#39;t scanned all edges out of NodeIdx, continue scanning</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EdgeIdx &lt; Edges&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;NodeIdx&#93;&#91;EdgeIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Nodes&#91;Edge.Dst&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().second++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge.OnShortestPath) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we haven&#39;t seen Edge.Dst so far, continue DFS search there</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Discovery == 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.NumCalls &lt; MaxDfsCalls) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Discovery = ++Time;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.emplace(Edge.Dst, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.NumCalls++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Taken &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Finish != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Else, if Edge.Dst already have a path to Target, so that NodeIdx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are done scanning all edge out of NodeIdx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we haven&#39;t found a path from NodeIdx to Target, forget about it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Taken) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">          Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Discovery = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we have found a path from NodeIdx to Target, then finish NodeIdx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and propagate Taken flag to DFS parent unless at the Source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">          Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Finish = ++Time;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NodeIdx == Source if and only if the stack is empty</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeIdx != Source) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.empty() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;empty stack while running dfs&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().first&#93;.Taken = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">          AugmentingOrder.push&#95;back(NodeIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Nodes are collected decreasing Finish time, so the order is reversed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::reverse(AugmentingOrder.begin(), AugmentingOrder.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 2: Extract all forward (DAG) edges and fill in AugmentingEdges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">      AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge.Dst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge.OnShortestPath &amp;&amp; Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Taken &amp;&amp; Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Taken &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Finish &lt; Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Finish) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">          AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.push&#95;back(&amp;Edge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Src == Target || !AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a0e9cf49b789ff0825ffea99d23afd013">empty</a>()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrectly constructed augmenting edges&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AugmentingOrder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Update the current flow along the given (acyclic) subgraph specified by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the vertex order, AugmentingOrder. The objective is to send as much flow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// as possible while evenly distributing flow among successors of each node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// After the update at least one edge is saturated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> augmentFlowAlongDAG(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; &amp;AugmentingOrder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 0: Initialization</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">      Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.FracFlow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">      Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">        Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 1: Send a unit of fractional flow along the DAG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t MaxFlowAmount = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.FracFlow = 1.0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Src == Target || Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.FracFlow &gt; 0.0) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrectly computed fractional flow&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Distribute flow evenly among successors of Src</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Degree = AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EdgeFlow = Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.FracFlow / Degree;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">        Nodes&#91;Edge-&gt;Dst&#93;.FracFlow += EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge-&gt;Capacity == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t MaxIntFlow = double(Edge-&gt;Capacity - Edge-&gt;Flow) / EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">        MaxFlowAmount = std::min(MaxFlowAmount, MaxIntFlow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop early if we cannot send any (integral) flow from Source to Target</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxFlowAmount == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 2: Send an integral flow of MaxFlowAmount</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.IntFlow = MaxFlowAmount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Src == Target)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Distribute flow evenly among successors of Src, rounding up to make</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sure all flow is sent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Degree = AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are guaranteeed that Node&#91;Src&#93;.IntFlow &lt;= SuccFlow &#42; Degree</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t SuccFlow = (Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow + Degree - 1) / Degree;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge-&gt;Dst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t EdgeFlow = std::min(Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.IntFlow, SuccFlow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">        EdgeFlow = std::min(EdgeFlow, uint64&#95;t(Edge-&gt;Capacity - Edge-&gt;Flow));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.IntFlow += EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow -= EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">        Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow += EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.IntFlow &lt;= MaxFlowAmount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.IntFlow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 3: Send excess flow back traversing the nodes backwards.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Because of rounding, not all flow can be sent along the edges of Src.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Hence, sending the remaining flow back to maintain flow conservation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = AugmentingOrder.size() - 1; Idx &gt; 0; Idx--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = AugmentingOrder&#91;Idx - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to send excess flow back along each edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure we only send back flow we just augmented (AugmentedFlow).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge-&gt;Dst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.IntFlow == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t EdgeFlow = std::min(Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.IntFlow, Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.IntFlow -= EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow += EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">        Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow -= EdgeFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Phase 4: Update flow values along all edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasSaturatedEdges = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify that we have sent all the excess flow from the node</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Src == Source || Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.IntFlow == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(uint64&#95;t(Edge-&gt;Capacity - Edge-&gt;Flow) &gt;= Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update flow values along the edge and its reverse copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;RevEdge = Edges&#91;Edge-&gt;Dst&#93;&#91;Edge-&gt;RevEdgeIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">        Edge-&gt;Flow += Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">        RevEdge.Flow -= Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge-&gt;Capacity == Edge-&gt;Flow &amp;&amp; Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">          HasSaturatedEdges = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The augmentation is successful iff at least one edge becomes saturated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasSaturatedEdges;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Identify candidate (shortest) edges for augmentation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> identifyShortestEdges(uint64&#95;t PathCapacity) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PathCapacity &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;found an incorrect augmenting DAG&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To make sure the augmentation DAG contains only edges with large residual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// capacity, we prune all edges whose capacity is below a fraction of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the capacity of the augmented path.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (All edges of the path itself are always in the DAG)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t MinCapacity = std::max(PathCapacity / 2, uint64&#95;t(1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Decide which edges are on a shortest path from Source to Target</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Src = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> &lt; Nodes.size(); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An edge cannot be augmenting if the endpoint has large distance</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Distance &gt; Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge.Dst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">        Edge.OnShortestPath =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> != Target &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> != Source &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Distance &lt;= Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Distance == Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.Distance + Edge.Cost &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">            Edge.Capacity &gt; Edge.Flow &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">            uint64&#95;t(Edge.Capacity - Edge.Flow) &gt;= MinCapacity;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Maximum number of DFS iterations for DAG finding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t MaxDfsCalls = 10;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A node in a flow network.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">Node &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The cost of the cheapest path from the source to the current node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t Distance;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The node preceding the current one in the path.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t ParentNode;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The index of the edge between ParentNode and the current node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t ParentEdgeIndex;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// An indicator of whether the current node is in a queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Taken;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Data fields utilized in DAG-augmentation:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Fractional flow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FracFlow;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Integral flow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t IntFlow;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Discovery time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Discovery;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Finish time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Finish;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// NumCalls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t NumCalls;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// An edge in a flow network.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">Edge &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The cost of the edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t Cost;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The capacity of the edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t Capacity;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The current flow on the edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t Flow;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The destination node of the edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Dst;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The index of the reverse edge between Dst and the current node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t RevEdgeIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Data fields utilized in DAG-augmentation:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Whether the edge is currently on a shortest path from Source to Target.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OnShortestPath;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Extra flow along the edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t AugmentedFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;Node&gt; Nodes;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge&gt;&gt; Edges;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Source node of the flow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
