<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Target (sink) node of the flow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Target;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Augmenting edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge &#42;&gt;&gt; AugmentingEdges;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Params for flow computation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ProfiParams &amp;Params;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A post-processing adjustment of the control flow. It applies two steps by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="comment">/// rerouting some flow and making it more realistic:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - First, it removes all isolated components (&quot;islands&quot;) with a positive flow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="comment">///   that are unreachable from the entry block. For every such component, we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="comment">///   find the shortest from the entry to an exit passing through the component,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="comment">///   and increase the flow by one unit along the path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - Second, it identifies all &quot;unknown subgraphs&quot; consisting of basic blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="comment">///   with no sampled counts. Then it rebalnces the flow that goes through such</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="comment">///   a subgraph so that each branch is taken with probability 50%.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="comment">///   An unknown subgraph is such that for every two nodes u and v:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="comment">///     - u dominates v and u is not unknown;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="comment">///     - v post-dominates u; and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="comment">///     - all inner-nodes of all (u,v)-paths are unknown.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster/#ad04ad58c6ccb8efe2be143e1bf61dd3c">FlowAdjuster</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster/#ad04ad58c6ccb8efe2be143e1bf61dd3c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster/#ad04ad58c6ccb8efe2be143e1bf61dd3c">FlowAdjuster</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowfunction">FlowFunction</a> &amp;Func)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">      : Params(Params), Func(Func) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Apply the post-processing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster/#aea8a2f7647fe57cd4d7e265585c4806e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster/#aea8a2f7647fe57cd4d7e265585c4806e">run</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find blocks that are reachable from the source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">    findReachable(Func.Entry, Visited);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumBlocks(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Flow &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; !Visited&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find a path from the entry to an exit passing through the block I</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Path = findShortestPath(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Increase the flow along the path</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Path.size() &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; Path&#91;0&#93;-&gt;Source == Func.Entry &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">        Func.Blocks&#91;Func.Entry&#93;.Flow += 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Jump : Path) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">          Jump-&gt;Flow += 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">          Func.Blocks&#91;Jump-&gt;Target&#93;.Flow += 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update reachability</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal">          findReachable(Jump-&gt;Target, Visited);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Run BFS from a given block along the jumps with a positive flow and mark</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> findReachable(uint64&#95;t Src, BitVector &amp;Visited) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Visited&#91;Src&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::queue&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Src);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">    Visited&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : Func.Blocks&#91;Src&#93;.SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump-&gt;Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump-&gt;Flow &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; !Visited&#91;Dst&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Dst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">          Visited&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Find the shortest path from the entry block to an exit block passing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// through a given block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; findShortestPath(uint64&#95;t BlockIdx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A path from the entry block to BlockIdx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ForwardPath = findShortestPath(Func.Entry, BlockIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A path from BlockIdx to an exit block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BackwardPath = findShortestPath(BlockIdx, AnyExitBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Concatenate the two paths</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.end(), ForwardPath.begin(), ForwardPath.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.end(), BackwardPath.begin(), BackwardPath.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Apply the Dijkstra algorithm to find the shortest path from a given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Source to a given Target block.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If Target == -1, then the path ends at an exit block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; findShortestPath(uint64&#95;t Source, uint64&#95;t Target) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Quit early, if possible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Source == Target)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Func.Blocks&#91;Source&#93;.isExit() &amp;&amp; Target == AnyExitBlock)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize data structures</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Distance = std::vector&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;(NumBlocks(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Parent = std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt;(NumBlocks(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">    Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sched/#ab8d854a5ce2331586bcc6830cca52f0fac13545a6345c7d5b3c9cc8932ad3b0e9">Source</a>&#93; = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::set&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, uint64&#95;t&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Distance&#91;Source&#93;, Source));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Run the Dijkstra algorithm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.begin()-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.erase(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.begin());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we found a solution, quit early</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Src == Target ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">          (Func.Blocks&#91;Src&#93;.isExit() &amp;&amp; Target == AnyExitBlock))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : Func.Blocks&#91;Src&#93;.SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump-&gt;Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">        int64&#95;t JumpDist = jumpDistance(Jump);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Distance&#91;Dst&#93; &gt; Distance&#91;Src&#93; + JumpDist) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.erase(std::make&#95;pair(Distance&#91;Dst&#93;, Dst));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">          Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93; + JumpDist;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">          Parent&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = Jump;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Distance&#91;Dst&#93;, Dst));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Target is not provided, find the closest exit block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Target == AnyExitBlock) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumBlocks(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.isExit() &amp;&amp; Parent&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Target == AnyExitBlock || Distance&#91;Target&#93; &gt; Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/exp/#af7592dc94276d1958420bcfb414b6998">Target</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Parent&#91;Target&#93; != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;a path does not exist&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract the constructed path</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Now = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/exp/#af7592dc94276d1958420bcfb414b6998">Target</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Now != Source) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Now == Parent&#91;Now&#93;-&gt;Target &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrect parent jump&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(Parent&#91;Now&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">      Now = Parent&#91;Now&#93;-&gt;Source;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reverse the path, since it is extracted from Target to Source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::reverse(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A distance of a path for a given jump.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In order to incite the path to use blocks/jumps with large positive flow,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and avoid changing branch probability of outgoing edges drastically,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// set the jump distance so as:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - to minimize the number of unlikely jumps used and subject to that,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - to minimize the number of Flow == 0 jumps used and subject to that,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - minimizes total multiplicative Flow increase for the remaining edges.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// To capture this objective with integer distances, we round off fractional</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// parts to a multiple of 1 / BaseDistance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t jumpDistance(FlowJump &#42;Jump)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#a061ed8974c636291de7f7cf5c76e4660">IsUnlikely</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Params.CostUnlikely;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t BaseDistance =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::max(FlowAdjuster::MinBaseDistance,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">                 std::min(Func.Blocks&#91;Func.Entry&#93;.Flow,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal">                          Params.CostUnlikely / (2 &#42; (NumBlocks() + 1))));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a> &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BaseDistance + BaseDistance / Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 2 &#42; BaseDistance &#42; (NumBlocks() + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t NumBlocks()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Func.Blocks.size(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Rebalance unknown subgraphs so that the flow is split evenly across the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// outgoing branches of every block of the subgraph. The method iterates over</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// blocks with known weight and identifies unknown subgraphs rooted at the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// blocks. Then it verifies if flow rebalancing is feasible and applies it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rebalanceUnknownSubgraphs() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to find unknown subgraphs from each block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &amp;SrcBlock : Func.Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify if rebalancing rooted at SrcBlock is feasible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!canRebalanceAtRoot(&amp;SrcBlock))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find an unknown subgraphs starting at SrcBlock. Along the way,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fill in known destinations and intermediate unknown blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; UnknownBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; KnownDstBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">      findUnknownSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, KnownDstBlocks, UnknownBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify if rebalancing of the subgraph is feasible. If the search is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// successful, find the unique destination block (which can be null)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">      FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!canRebalanceSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, KnownDstBlocks, UnknownBlocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">                                DstBlock))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We cannot rebalance subgraphs containing cycles among unknown blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!isAcyclicSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, DstBlock, UnknownBlocks))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rebalance the flow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal">      rebalanceUnknownSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, DstBlock, UnknownBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Verify if rebalancing rooted at a given block is possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> canRebalanceAtRoot(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not attempt to find unknown subgraphs from an unknown or a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// zero-flow block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#aac571aba0964e18080de57124d2f9866">HasUnknownWeight</a> || SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a5204b5e55328f7a80fce9423c4cee8c1">Flow</a> == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not attempt to process subgraphs from a block w/o unknown sucessors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasUnknownSuccs = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#ab471dfaaaa5b8d4801330067baab383e">SuccJumps</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Func.Blocks&#91;Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>&#93;.HasUnknownWeight) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">        HasUnknownSuccs = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!HasUnknownSuccs)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Find an unknown subgraph starting at block SrcBlock. The method sets</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// identified destinations, KnownDstBlocks, and intermediate UnknownBlocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> findUnknownSubgraph(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal">                           std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;KnownDstBlocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal">                           std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;UnknownBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Run BFS from SrcBlock and make sure all paths are going through unknown</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks and end at a known DstBlock</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Visited = BitVector(NumBlocks(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::queue&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a13613f61cfca8d0f1a0f9a09f26353e0">Index</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="normal">    Visited&#91;SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a13613f61cfca8d0f1a0f9a09f26353e0">Index</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.front()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Process blocks reachable from Block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Jump can be ignored, skip it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, Jump))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Dst has been visited, skip Jump</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Visited&#91;Dst&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Process block Dst</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><Highlight kind="normal">        Visited&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Func.Blocks&#91;Dst&#93;.HasUnknownWeight) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">          KnownDstBlocks.push&#95;back(&amp;Func.Blocks&#91;Dst&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Dst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">          UnknownBlocks.push&#95;back(&amp;Func.Blocks&#91;Dst&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Verify if rebalancing of the subgraph is feasible. If the checks are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// successful, set the unique destination block, DstBlock (can be null).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> canRebalanceSubgraph(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;KnownDstBlocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;UnknownBlocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">                            FlowBlock &#42;&amp;DstBlock) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the list of unknown blocks is empty, we don&#39;t need rebalancing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UnknownBlocks.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are multiple known sinks, we can&#39;t rebalance</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (KnownDstBlocks.size() &gt; 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">    DstBlock = KnownDstBlocks.empty() ? nullptr : KnownDstBlocks.front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify sinks of the subgraph</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> : UnknownBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are multiple (known and unknown) sinks, we can&#39;t rebalance</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstBlock != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumIgnoredJumps = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">          NumIgnoredJumps++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is a non-sink block in UnknownBlocks with all jumps ignored,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then we can&#39;t rebalance</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumIgnoredJumps == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps.size())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Decide whether the Jump is ignored while processing an unknown subgraphs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// rooted at basic block SrcBlock with the destination block, DstBlock.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ignoreJump(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowJump &#42;Jump) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore unlikely jumps with zero flow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#a061ed8974c636291de7f7cf5c76e4660">IsUnlikely</a> &amp;&amp; Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a> == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> JumpSource = &amp;Func.Blocks&#91;Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#ae9c91a5ea45940cfaa166511aadd2eb2">Source</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> JumpTarget = &amp;Func.Blocks&#91;Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not ignore jumps coming into DstBlock</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstBlock != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; JumpTarget == DstBlock)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore jumps out of SrcBlock to known blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!JumpTarget-&gt;HasUnknownWeight &amp;&amp; JumpSource == SrcBlock)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore jumps to known blocks with zero flow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!JumpTarget-&gt;HasUnknownWeight &amp;&amp; JumpTarget-&gt;Flow == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Verify if the given unknown subgraph is acyclic, and if yes, reorder</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// UnknownBlocks in the topological order (so that all jumps are &quot;forward&quot;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isAcyclicSubgraph(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">                         std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;UnknownBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract local in-degrees in the considered subgraph</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LocalInDegree = std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(NumBlocks(), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> fillInDegree = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">        LocalInDegree&#91;Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>&#93;++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">    fillInDegree(SrcBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> : UnknownBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">      fillInDegree(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A loop containing SrcBlock</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LocalInDegree&#91;SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a13613f61cfca8d0f1a0f9a09f26353e0">Index</a>&#93; &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; AcyclicOrder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::queue&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a13613f61cfca8d0f1a0f9a09f26353e0">Index</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="normal">      FlowBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = &amp;Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.front()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop propagation once we reach DstBlock, if any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstBlock != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> == DstBlock)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep an acyclic order of unknown blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;HasUnknownWeight &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> != SrcBlock)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><Highlight kind="normal">        AcyclicOrder.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add to the queue all successors with zero local in-degree</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><Highlight kind="normal">        LocalInDegree&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LocalInDegree&#91;Dst&#93; == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
