<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Dst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is a cycle in the subgraph, AcyclicOrder contains only a subset</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of all blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UnknownBlocks.size() != AcyclicOrder.size())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><Highlight kind="normal">    UnknownBlocks = AcyclicOrder;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Rebalance a given subgraph rooted at SrcBlock, ending at DstBlock and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// having UnknownBlocks intermediate blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rebalanceUnknownSubgraph(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;UnknownBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a5204b5e55328f7a80fce9423c4cee8c1">Flow</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;zero-flow block in unknown subgraph&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ditribute flow from the source block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t BlockFlow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SrcBlock&#39;s flow is the sum of outgoing flows along non-ignored jumps</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#ab471dfaaaa5b8d4801330067baab383e">SuccJumps</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><Highlight kind="normal">      BlockFlow += Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><Highlight kind="normal">    rebalanceBlock(SrcBlock, DstBlock, SrcBlock, BlockFlow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ditribute flow from the remaining blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> : UnknownBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;HasUnknownWeight &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrect unknown subgraph&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t BlockFlow = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Block&#39;s flow is the sum of incoming flows</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;PredJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><Highlight kind="normal">        BlockFlow += Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;Flow = BlockFlow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><Highlight kind="normal">      rebalanceBlock(SrcBlock, DstBlock, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>, BlockFlow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Redistribute flow for a block in a subgraph rooted at SrcBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and ending at DstBlock.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rebalanceBlock(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><Highlight kind="normal">                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlowBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>, uint64&#95;t BlockFlow) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Process all successor jumps and update corresponding flow values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockDegree = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><Highlight kind="normal">      BlockDegree++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If all successor jumps of the block are ignored, skip it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstBlock == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; BlockDegree == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BlockDegree &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;all outgoing jumps are ignored&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each of the Block&#39;s successors gets the following amount of flow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rounding the value up so that all flow is propagated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t SuccFlow = (BlockFlow + BlockDegree - 1) / BlockDegree;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a> = std::min(SuccFlow, BlockFlow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="normal">      Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal">      BlockFlow -= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BlockFlow == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;not all flow is propagated&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A constant indicating an arbitrary exit block of a function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t AnyExitBlock = uint64&#95;t(-1);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Minimum BaseDistance for the jump distance values in island joining.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t MinBaseDistance = 10000;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Params for flow computation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ProfiParams &amp;Params;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">  FlowFunction &amp;Func;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;int64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#ad129e295efcd7c789b6c5d67124adef8">assignBlockCosts</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock">FlowBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;int64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a1ce5cbe1af8289db9c7121774c7ea192">assignJumpCosts</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump">FlowJump</a> &amp;Jump);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Initializing flow network for a given function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Every block is split into two nodes that are responsible for (i) an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="comment">/// incoming flow, (ii) an outgoing flow; they penalize an increase or a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="comment">/// reduction of the block weight.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a46dd2e73fdb4a5c9bf2af4a8fa968bd1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a46dd2e73fdb4a5c9bf2af4a8fa968bd1">initializeNetwork</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow">MinCostMaxFlow</a> &amp;Network,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowfunction">FlowFunction</a> &amp;Func) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t NumBlocks = Func.Blocks.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumBlocks &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Too few blocks in a function&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t NumJumps = Func.Jumps.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumJumps &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Too few jumps in a function&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Introducing dummy source/sink pairs to allow flow circulation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The nodes corresponding to blocks of the function have indices in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the range &#91;0 .. 2 &#42; NumBlocks); the dummy sources/sinks are indexed by the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// next four values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t S = 2 &#42; NumBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t T = S + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a> = S + 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t T1 = S + 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="normal">  Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#acbf43214acfd3c95a6e28d1db4989d91">initialize</a>(2 &#42; NumBlocks + 4, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a>, T1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize nodes of the flow network</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> &lt; NumBlocks; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Assign costs for increasing/decreasing the block counts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#ad129e295efcd7c789b6c5d67124adef8"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;int64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#ad129e295efcd7c789b6c5d67124adef8">assignBlockCosts</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the costs depending on the block metadata</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal">    CostDec = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Increasing the count for &quot;cold&quot; blocks with zero initial count is more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expensive than for &quot;hot&quot; ones</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Weight == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a9e351546ca08436a0e7a7ccfa08f5495">CostBlockZeroInc</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Modifying the count of the entry block is expensive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.isEntry()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#af820f5e80ca4cd2a823d4dbd16714bc1">CostBlockEntryInc</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(CostInc, CostDec);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Assign costs for increasing/decreasing the jump counts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Modifying the weight of an unlikely jump is expensive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#a061ed8974c636291de7f7cf5c76e4660">IsUnlikely</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#ac04da42f4440b9ea85d4ae6400b4e8ce">CostJumpInc</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t CostDec = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a94bec6d7c1e0827854d72091aacf81f7">CostJumpDec</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the costs depending on the block metadata</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#ae9c91a5ea45940cfaa166511aadd2eb2">Source</a> + 1 == Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjusting the fall-through branch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><Highlight kind="normal">    CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a55e432c2b9b6e25f5a83f1d5ac7655b7">CostJumpFTInc</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><Highlight kind="normal">    CostDec = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#adb1dd7977642b5222b9fac44305f562e">CostJumpFTDec</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#a491b58e7abf9b59f256a3c66443a1ad5">HasUnknownWeight</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The cost is different for fall-through and non-fall-through branches</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#ae9c91a5ea45940cfaa166511aadd2eb2">Source</a> + 1 == Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><Highlight kind="normal">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a2aa4f0b714c6b54a55b97af255f6f62c">CostJumpUnknownFTInc</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><Highlight kind="normal">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#acecc0d05ec41075cc30e0c9bbb0c20b9">CostJumpUnknownInc</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><Highlight kind="normal">    CostDec = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#acdd34566a25bab9890d87c9de6e7e8b0">Weight</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;found zero-weight jump with a positive weight&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(CostInc, CostDec);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t SrcOut = 2 &#42; Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#ae9c91a5ea45940cfaa166511aadd2eb2">Source</a> + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
